name: Blood Orange, Date And Parmesan Salad With Almond Oil
keywords: blood orange, dates, parmesan, spring, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 8 fresh and moist Deglet Noor dates (preferably from a Middle Eastern market), pitted and cut in two, or 4 Medjool dates, quartered
12 to 16 large paper-thin slices of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
3 tablespoons pure almond oil, for sprinkling (see note), or hazelnut oil

recipeInstructions.text: Slice stem and flower ends from oranges. Using a sharp paring knife and working from top to bottom, slice off peel and pith. Thinly slice each orange crosswise. You should get 8 to 10 slices from each orange.

On a platter, scatter 1/3 of arugula leaves. Then layer rest of ingredients, placing 1/3 of dates on top of and around arugula, then slices of orange and a few slices of cheese, and almonds. Continue layering until all ingredients mingle but are not piled up. Sprinkle with oil, and season lightly with pepper. Serve.
